category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: scheduling_graph_dataSource_filter
preference.preference_description: Used with Schedule Manager resource graphs. Specifies the filtering method used when creating resource graphs. Valid Values: none - No filter is applied. selection - Users can select which schedules are used to create the resource graph. current - The current schedule is used to create the resource graph.
